message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product. Given its value, I believe a price of $11,000 is fair. What do you think?
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. I really like the product, but I have to stay within my budget.
Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $9,500 is significantly below its value.  I could come down to $10,500. It's a fair compromise.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm thinking more along the lines of $9,800. Can you meet me in the middle?
